extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.solr.GetSolr
extension.description: Queries Solr and outputs the results as a FlowFile in the format of XML or using a Record Writer

property.name: Solr Type
property.description: The type of Solr instance, Cloud or Standard.

property.name: Solr Location
property.description: The Solr url for a Solr Type of Standard (ex: http://localhost:8984/solr/gettingstarted), or the ZooKeeper hosts for a Solr Type of Cloud (ex: localhost:9983).

property.name: Collection
property.description: The Solr collection name, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud

property.name: Return Type
property.description: Write Solr documents to FlowFiles as XML or using a Record Writer

property.name: Record Writer
property.description: The Record Writer to use in order to write Solr documents to FlowFiles. Must be set if "Records" is used as return type.

property.name: Solr Query
property.description: A query to execute against Solr

property.name: Date Field
property.description: The name of a date field in Solr used to filter results

property.name: Initial Date Filter
property.description: Date value to filter results. Documents with an earlier date will not be fetched. The format has to correspond to the date pattern of Solr 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'

property.name: Return Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of field names to return

property.name: Batch Size
property.description: Number of rows per Solr query

property.name: kerberos-credentials-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos Credentials Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-user-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos User Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-principal
property.description: The principal to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: kerberos-password
property.description: The password to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: Username
property.description: The username to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: Password
property.description: The password to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: SSL Context Service
property.description: The Controller Service to use in order to obtain an SSL Context. This property must be set when communicating with a Solr over https.

property.name: Solr Socket Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a socket connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections
property.description: The maximum number of total connections allowed from the Solr client to Solr.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections Per Host
property.description: The maximum number of connections allowed from the Solr client to a single Solr host.

property.name: ZooKeeper Client Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

property.name: ZooKeeper Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

stateful.description: Stores latest date of Date Field so that the same data will not be fetched multiple times.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.solr.PutSolrContentStream
extension.description: Sends the contents of a FlowFile as a ContentStream to Solr

property.name: Solr Type
property.description: The type of Solr instance, Cloud or Standard.

property.name: Solr Location
property.description: The Solr url for a Solr Type of Standard (ex: http://localhost:8984/solr/gettingstarted), or the ZooKeeper hosts for a Solr Type of Cloud (ex: localhost:9983).

property.name: Collection
property.description: The Solr collection name, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud

property.name: Content Stream Path
property.description: The path in Solr to post the ContentStream

property.name: Content-Type
property.description: Content-Type being sent to Solr

property.name: Commit Within
property.description: The number of milliseconds before the given update is committed

property.name: kerberos-credentials-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos Credentials Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-user-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos User Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-principal
property.description: The principal to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: kerberos-password
property.description: The password to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: Username
property.description: The username to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: Password
property.description: The password to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: SSL Context Service
property.description: The Controller Service to use in order to obtain an SSL Context. This property must be set when communicating with a Solr over https.

property.name: Solr Socket Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a socket connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections
property.description: The maximum number of total connections allowed from the Solr client to Solr.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections Per Host
property.description: The maximum number of connections allowed from the Solr client to a single Solr host.

property.name: ZooKeeper Client Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

property.name: ZooKeeper Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

dynamicProperty.name: A Solr request parameter name
dynamicProperty.description: These parameters will be passed to Solr on the request

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles that failed for any reason other than Solr being unreachable

relationship.name: connection_failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles that failed because Solr is unreachable

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.solr.PutSolrRecord
extension.description: Indexes the Records from a FlowFile into Solr

property.name: Solr Type
property.description: The type of Solr instance, Cloud or Standard.

property.name: Solr Location
property.description: The Solr url for a Solr Type of Standard (ex: http://localhost:8984/solr/gettingstarted), or the ZooKeeper hosts for a Solr Type of Cloud (ex: localhost:9983).

property.name: Collection
property.description: The Solr collection name, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud

property.name: Solr Update Path
property.description: The path in Solr to post the Flowfile Records

property.name: put-solr-record-record-reader
property.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for parsing incoming data and determining the data's schema.

property.name: Fields To Index
property.description: Comma-separated list of field names to write

property.name: Commit Within
property.description: The number of milliseconds before the given update is committed

property.name: kerberos-credentials-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos Credentials Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-user-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos User Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-principal
property.description: The principal to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: kerberos-password
property.description: The password to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: Username
property.description: The username to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: Password
property.description: The password to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: SSL Context Service
property.description: The Controller Service to use in order to obtain an SSL Context. This property must be set when communicating with a Solr over https.

property.name: Solr Socket Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a socket connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections
property.description: The maximum number of total connections allowed from the Solr client to Solr.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections Per Host
property.description: The maximum number of connections allowed from the Solr client to a single Solr host.

property.name: ZooKeeper Client Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

property.name: ZooKeeper Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

property.name: Batch Size
property.description: The number of solr documents to index per batch

dynamicProperty.name: A Solr request parameter name
dynamicProperty.description: These parameters will be passed to Solr on the request

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles that failed for any reason other than Solr being unreachable

relationship.name: connection_failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles that failed because Solr is unreachable

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.solr.QuerySolr
extension.description: Queries Solr and outputs the results as a FlowFile in the format of XML or using a Record Writer

property.name: Solr Type
property.description: The type of Solr instance, Cloud or Standard.

property.name: Solr Location
property.description: The Solr url for a Solr Type of Standard (ex: http://localhost:8984/solr/gettingstarted), or the ZooKeeper hosts for a Solr Type of Cloud (ex: localhost:9983).

property.name: Collection
property.description: The Solr collection name, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud

property.name: return_type
property.description: Output format of Solr results. Write Solr documents to FlowFiles as XML or using a Record Writer

property.name: Record Writer
property.description: The Record Writer to use in order to write Solr documents to FlowFiles. Must be set if "Records" is used as return type.

property.name: solr_param_query
property.description: Solr Query, e. g. field:value

property.name: solr_param_request_handler
property.description: Define a request handler here, e. g. /query

property.name: solr_param_field_list
property.description: Comma separated list of fields to be included into results, e. g. field1,field2

property.name: solr_param_sort
property.description: Comma separated sort clauses to define the sorting of results, e. g. field1 asc, field2 desc

property.name: solr_param_start
property.description: Offset of result set

property.name: solr_param_rows
property.description: Number of results to be returned for a single request

property.name: amount_documents_to_return
property.description: Total amount of Solr documents to be returned. If this property is set to "Only top results", only single requests will be sent to Solr and the results will be written into single FlowFiles. If it is set to "Entire results", all results matching to the query are retrieved via multiple Solr requests and returned in multiple FlowFiles. For both options, the number of Solr documents to be returned in a FlowFile depends on the configuration of the "Rows" property

property.name: kerberos-credentials-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos Credentials Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-user-service
property.description: Specifies the Kerberos User Controller Service that should be used for authenticating with Kerberos

property.name: kerberos-principal
property.description: The principal to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: kerberos-password
property.description: The password to use when specifying the principal and password directly in the processor for authenticating to Solr via Kerberos.

property.name: Username
property.description: The username to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: Password
property.description: The password to use when Solr is configured with basic authentication.

property.name: SSL Context Service
property.description: The Controller Service to use in order to obtain an SSL Context. This property must be set when communicating with a Solr over https.

property.name: Solr Socket Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a socket connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to Solr. A value of 0 indicates an infinite timeout.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections
property.description: The maximum number of total connections allowed from the Solr client to Solr.

property.name: Solr Maximum Connections Per Host
property.description: The maximum number of connections allowed from the Solr client to a single Solr host.

property.name: ZooKeeper Client Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait for data on a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

property.name: ZooKeeper Connection Timeout
property.description: The amount of time to wait when establishing a connection to ZooKeeper, only used with a Solr Type of Cloud.

dynamicProperty.name: A Solr request parameter name
dynamicProperty.description: These parameters will be passed to Solr on the request

writesAttribute.name: solr.cursor.mark
writesAttribute.description: Cursor mark can be used for scrolling Solr

writesAttribute.name: solr.status.code
writesAttribute.description: Status code of Solr request. A status code of 0 indicates that the request was successfully processed

writesAttribute.name: solr.query.time
writesAttribute.description: The elapsed time to process the query (in ms)

writesAttribute.name: solr.start
writesAttribute.description: Solr start parameter (result offset) for the query

writesAttribute.name: solr.rows
writesAttribute.description: Number of Solr documents to be returned for the query

writesAttribute.name: solr.number.results
writesAttribute.description: Number of Solr documents that match the query

writesAttribute.name: mime.type
writesAttribute.description: The mime type of the data format

writesAttribute.name: querysolr.exeption.class
writesAttribute.description: The Java exception class raised when the processor fails

writesAttribute.name: querysolr.exeption.message
writesAttribute.description: The Java exception message raised when the processor fails
